title: Kitchin-physick, or, Advice to the poor by way of dialogue betwixt Philanthropos, physician, Eugenius, apthecary [sic], Lazarus, patient. With rules and directions, how to prevent sickness, and cure diseases by diet ...
author: Cock, Thomas.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed for Dorman Newman, at the King's Arms in the Poultry ...,
